data.text: @stayhousedla Yet as of April 1, tens of thousands of people are going to become homeless due to the complete and utter failure of the rent relief program in the state, and the “head in the sand” attitude of our representatives.
@stayhousedla I am homeless because of eviction even though I applied for #housingiskey and got approved
@stayhousedla This is the WORST program ever. Applications sit from months and months. No information is given. It's garbage.

Las solicitudes para el Programa de Alivio de Renta COVID-19 de CA todavía están abiertas y pueden ayudarproteger a los inquilinos del desalojo. Los fondos son priorizados para aquellos que son los los ingresos más bajos y el mayor riesgo de desalojo. https://t.co/Hvw7trzgKc https://t.co/EEwYEKG13J
